metadata.description: Wetting agents, soil amendments, and biostimulants for turf management

pbs_150.application_notes: Premium soil surfactant. Block co-polymer technology for uniform water movement. Standard spray application.

pbs_150_inj.application_notes: Injection-grade version of PBS-150 for fertigation/injection systems.

excalibur.application_notes: Next-generation soil surfactant with enhanced penetration. Ideal for hydrophobic soils and LDS management.

oars.application_notes: Organic Acid Root Stimulant. Combines surfactant with organic acids for improved root zone conditions.

oars_ps.application_notes: OARS with added potassium silicate for stress tolerance and improved plant health.

oars_hs.application_notes: OARS with humic and fulvic acids. Enhanced soil biology and nutrient availability.

conduit_90.application_notes: 90-day residual wetting agent. Reduces frequency of surfactant applications.

aquifer.application_notes: Water conservation surfactant. Promotes deeper, more uniform water infiltration to reduce irrigation needs.

hydra_30_plus.application_notes: 30-day residual surfactant with enhanced formulation for consistent moisture management.

aqua_aid_original.application_notes: Original Aqua-Aid wetting agent. Proven performance for water management on all turf types.

fwy_isp.application_notes: Fairway-grade injection surfactant program. Designed for irrigation system injection on fairways and roughs.

aqm.application_notes: Aqua Quality Management. Premium surfactant for high-quality putting green and tee surfaces.

aqua_root.application_notes: Root zone enhancer combining surfactant technology with root-promoting biostimulants.

verde_cal.application_notes: Calcium sulfate-based soil amendment. Improves soil structure and displaces sodium.

verde_cal_g.application_notes: Granular calcium sulfate with enhanced dispersal. For greens and tees.

verde_cal_mg.application_notes: Calcium + magnesium soil amendment for soils deficient in both. Dual cation displacement.

verde_cal_k_plus.application_notes: Calcium soil amendment with potassium. Addresses both Ca and K deficiencies simultaneously.

verde_lawn.application_notes: Combination fertilizer and soil amendment with iron for color and calcium for soil health.

verde_lawn_hydro.application_notes: Verde-Lawn with built-in surfactant technology for improved water infiltration.

acidi_phlow.application_notes: Acid-forming soil amendment to lower pH. Contains sulfur compounds for bicarbonate reduction.

acidiphy.application_notes: Injection-grade acidifying agent for irrigation water treatment. Lowers water pH and bicarbonates.

aqua_carbon.application_notes: Liquid carbon source for soil biology. Feeds beneficial microbes and improves organic matter cycling.

remediator.application_notes: Soil remediation product for salt-affected soils. Combines surfactant with displacement chemistry.

salt_aid.application_notes: Liquid salt management product with calcium. Displaces sodium from soil exchange sites.

turf_power.application_notes: Comprehensive biostimulant with seaweed extract, humic acids, and amino acids for turf health and recovery.
